package.name: Gesturesi11
package.shortDescription: Bring modern gestures to your iPhone.

descriptionlist.description:
- iPhone X gestures.
- Miniature(similar iPhone X gestures): Reduce the ability to switch applications quickly when swiping left or right on the bottom edge.
- Status Bar: iPhone X, Calibrate, and Regular.
- Battery Percentage Custom.
- Bottom Inset, Rounded Dock-App Switcher, Screen Corner.
- Home Bar.
- CC Status Bar.
- Screenshot buttons combination like iPhone X.
- Lockscreen Shortcuts.
- No Breadcrumbs.
- Dark Keyboard, Higher Keyboard, Non-Latin Keyboard (fix conflict right padding), No Gesture When Keyboard.
- Zoom and Flip Control like iPhone 11.
- Reduce Rows.
